criteria: Application of Absolute Value for Distance
descriptions: Student is unable to plot points in any quadrant or demonstrates significant errors.
Student can plot points primarily in the first quadrant with limited accuracy.
Student can plot points in all four quadrants but makes frequent errors in sign or placement.
Student accurately plots points in all four quadrants with only occasional minor errors.
Student consistently and accurately plots points in all four quadrants, demonstrating a strong understanding of the coordinate plane.
Student flawlessly plots points in all four quadrants and can explain the relationship between coordinates and their location with precision.
Student does not attempt to use absolute value or shows no understanding of its relevance to distance.
Student attempts to use absolute value but demonstrates significant errors in calculations or application.
Student uses absolute value to find distances, but makes frequent errors, particularly with negative coordinates.
Student accurately applies absolute value to find distances between points with the same x or y coordinate, with only minor errors.
Student consistently and accurately uses absolute value to find distances, demonstrating a strong understanding of its application.
Student flawlessly applies absolute value and explains its significance in determining distances on the coordinate plane.
Student does not attempt to solve real-world problems or demonstrates no understanding of how to apply coordinate plane concepts.
Student attempts to solve real-world problems but demonstrates significant errors in setting up the problem or interpreting the results.
Student solves real-world problems with limited success, making frequent errors in graphing or distance calculations.
Student solves real-world problems with reasonable accuracy, showing understanding of how to use coordinate plane concepts, with only minor errors.
Student consistently and accurately solves real-world problems using graphing and distance calculations, demonstrating a strong understanding of the application of these concepts.

Student flawlessly solves real-world problems, demonstrating exceptional problem-solving skills and a deep understanding of the coordinate plane and absolute value concepts; solutions are clearly explained.
